resources.string:
Bigelozidane is the first C++ program that I wrote when I was roughly 16 years old and has now been converted to an Android app. It's essentially a simple substitution cipher that takes plain text and encodes it so other people can't read it.

Although decoding was not a part of the original program, it was my intention to add that functionality at some point. It only took 20+ years. ðŸ˜Ž

Important Note:
Please keep in mind that this is for entertainment purposes only. Don't encode any important information because substitution ciphers are easy to crack for experienced cryptographers.
